text: Jab un mein se ek giroh ne kaha ke “ aey yathrib ke logon, tumhare liye ab theharne ka koi mauqa nahin hai, palat chalo” jab unka ek fareeq yeh keh kar Nabi se rukhsat talab kar raha tha ke “hamare ghar khatrey mein hain,” halanke woh khatrey mein na thay. Dar-asal woh (muhaz e jung se[from the battle-front]) bhagna chahte thay
